name: part_001
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Opening title sequence for Amane Kanata's graduation live 'THE ABSOLUTE IDOL'.
Amane Kanata walks onto the stage and sings the intro snippet of her new song 'The Absolute Idol'.
Performance of the song 'Koya no Piece' (Piece of the Wilderness).

subtitles.original: 出会えた
subtitles.english: Meeting you...

subtitles.original: 奇跡に　もう息が止まりそうだよ
subtitles.english: ...was a miracle, it almost takes my breath away.

subtitles.original:
荒野のピース
作詞：澤田和也　作曲：菅野よう子
subtitles.english:
Piece of the Wilderness
Lyrics: Kazuya Sawada | Composition: Yoko Kanno

subtitles.original: 何を見ているの
subtitles.english: What are you looking at...

subtitles.original: どこまでも澄んだ瞳で
subtitles.english: ...with eyes as clear as can be?

subtitles.original: 二人だけが触れる世界で
subtitles.english: In a world that only the two of us can touch,

subtitles.original: きっと全てが今始まるから
subtitles.english: surely everything is beginning now.

subtitles.original: 君に会うために生まれたこと
subtitles.english: That I was born to meet you...

subtitles.original: 伝えたい想いだ
subtitles.english: ...is the feeling I want to convey.

subtitles.original: 涼やかな風も胸誘う
subtitles.english: A cool breeze also beckons to my heart,

subtitles.original: 視線も全部
subtitles.english: and my gaze, all of it...

subtitles.original: ヒリヒリする声になるのさ　ずっと
subtitles.english: ...becomes a voice that tingles, always.

subtitles.original: 君を側に感じる
subtitles.english: I feel you by my side.

subtitles.original: 濁りもない奇跡　持ち場は
subtitles.english: In this clear moment of a miracle, my post is...

subtitles.original: 振り返るものなんてない
subtitles.english: There's nothing to look back on.

subtitles.original: 二人きり未来さえ飛べるんだ
subtitles.english: Just the two of us, we can even fly to the future.

subtitles.original: どこへ行くの小さな
subtitles.english: Where are you going?

subtitles.original: 自分に涙あふれるけど走り出せる
subtitles.english: Tears overflow for my small self, but I can start running.

subtitles.original: もしはぐれたら体ごと
subtitles.english: If we get separated, with my whole body...

subtitles.original: 散ってみせる
subtitles.english: ...I'll show you I can bloom.

subtitles.original: 花びら舞った一夜の
subtitles.english: Taking the form of the petals...

subtitles.original: 姿になって君の愛も貯めてサービスするよ　ずっと
subtitles.english: ...that danced for one night, I'll store up your love and give it back, always.

subtitles.original: 君はそう微笑む
subtitles.english: You smile like that.

subtitles.original: 汚されない奇跡が
subtitles.english: The miracle that won't be tainted...

subtitles.original: 時を超えて呼び合う
subtitles.english: ...calls out to each other across time.

subtitles.original: 二人きり未来へと飛ぶんだ
subtitles.english: Just the two of us, we'll fly toward the future.

subtitles.original: 出会えた
subtitles.english: Meeting you...

subtitles.original: 奇跡に　もう息が止まりそうだよ
subtitles.english: ...was a miracle, it almost takes my breath away.

subtitles.original: 繋いだ
subtitles.english: In those joined...

subtitles.original: その手に　少し強くなれる気がする
subtitles.english: ...hands, I feel like I can become a little stronger.

subtitles.original: 出会えた
subtitles.english: Meeting you...

subtitles.original: 奇跡に　もう息が止まりそうだよ
subtitles.english: ...was a miracle, it almost takes my breath away.

subtitles.original: 明日も
subtitles.english: Tomorrow...

subtitles.original: 未来も　ただどうしようもなく好きだよ
subtitles.english: ...and the future too, I just love you beyond help.
